sentences.sContent: The doctor will be here soon. In the meantime, try and relax.
sentences.sCn: 医生很快就来，现在尽量放松一下。

sentences.sContent: I didn’t see her for another five years, and in the meantime she had got married and had a couple of kids.
sentences.sCn: 我又有五年没见到她，在此期间她结了婚并生了几个孩子。

trans.tranOther: in the period of time between now and a future event, or between two events in the past
